botStatus: YOUR BOT STATUS, Must be replaced to one of them: online or idle or dnd or invisible

memberCountChannelId: ENTER THE CHANNEL ID FOR SHOW YOUR SERVER MEMBER COUNT

pingOnJoinChannelId: YOUR PING ON JOIN CHANNEL ID (Mention your member to this channel while join)
dmWelcomerDescription:
YOUR DM WELCOMER EMBED DESCRIPTION (Less than 4096 characters and use 
 for go to the any new line)
